title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1211.122 - Poisonous solids, Class B, referenced to this section
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1211.122 - Poisonous solids, Class B, referenced to this section

State Regulations

Poisonous solids, Class B, listed in section
1211.150
for reference to this
section, are not restricted in quantity provided, however, such solids are in
containers of 25 pounds gross weight, or less. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1211.122

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
